headline: How VICI Properties (VICI) Enhances a Portfolio of REIT Dividend Stocks
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is included among the 12 Best REIT Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is a real estate investment trust with expertise in gaming, hospitality, and experiential properties, targeting ownership, acquisition, and financing in these segments. It pays out about 75% of its adjusted funds from operations (FFO), enabling […]
